alert.note: Alert for Coastal Miami Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 1:31PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Miami-Dade County through 200 PM EDT... At 131 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over The Crossings, or near Kendall, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Miami, Hialeah, Miami Beach, Coral Gables, South Miami, Virginia Key, Kendall, The Redland, Doral, Hialeah Gardens, Pinecrest, Miami Springs, Sweetwater, West Miami, Medley, Westchester, Glenvar Heights, Palmetto Bay, University Of Miami and Zoo Miami. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Excessive cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Miami Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade
